title: Gross domestic product ( GDP ) growth rate in Pakistan 2024
yAxis: GDP growth compared to previous year
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing GDP growth compared to previous year, containing a total of 11 data points.
In general GDP growth compared to previous year has rose over the Year.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2018 and 2019.
The highest GDP growth compared to previous year, of value 5.53 was reached at Year 2018
Minimum GDP growth compared to previous year about 2.35 was reached at Year 2020
